title: Sword Art Online Alternative: Gun Gale Online
overview: Sword Art Online Alternative: Gun Gale Online centers on Karen Kohiruimaki, who is bad at dealing with people in her life and plays virtual shooter MMO Gun Gale Online as the pink-clad Llen. She eventually meets a player named Pitohui, who pressures her into joining the Battle Royale-style tournament known as Squad Jam.
